name: Nodamiki
tagline: A certain art design franchise visual novel translation crew.
body:
## Seeking help
We're located at **#ga** on **irc.rizon.net** and we need primarily translators and also editors/QC; well - the usual deal. There's still a lot of work to do and, frankly, way too few people.

## Progress
### GA Geijutsuka Art Design Class: Slapstick Wonderland (PSP Visual novel)
As of 14.04.2015:  
  
Common route: translated  
Branches: 1/12 complete  
Files: 141/355

## Downloads
**[Demo patch](https://mega.co.nz/#!uwoHgAxA!zsmyMdW3XCHrGJyerjzW_qGk0pRN6vozc1mvP03pig0)** - common route + East/earnest branch (choose Kisaragi or Prof after chapter 2 and Kisaragi after chapter 3, the rest doesn't matter; no other branches are translated yet)  
  
[Route guide](http://pastebin.com/wdQAV26W) - spoiler warning
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
